page.title: 11LLANGADOG-THE Y.F.C. CLUB
page.content: There is a very active Young Farmers Club in the village and at present there are about 50 members.It meets every Monday night from September to April at the village Community Centre. The club was formed in 1943 and it is open to people from the ages of 13 to 25.Every year new officials are elected from the club.The club competes and socialises with other Y.F.C clubs in the area.The club takes part in public speaking,stock judging eisteddfod,half hour entertainment, drama sport and other competitions.The highlight of the year is the County Rally for all Y.F.Clubs held in Carmarthen mart ground.All the clubs compete in the Rally.The club also holds an annual concert and at Christmas sings carols around the village in order to raise money for charity.
